name: Ben
text: Sometimes you forget some things especially if there are too many.

name: Ben
text: Making lists helps you guide through items in an orderly fashion.

name: Ben
text: Therefore, lists can keep us from procrastinating.

name: Ben
text: We put this one off until the end.

name: Ben
text: Making a list enables us to get our heads around really big tasks â€” and helps us tackle the work one aspect at a time.
